data.name: Killsquad - SteelSeries
data.detailed_description: Dive right into the intense action Killsquad has to offer with these new SteelSeries Skins, one for each of our heroes. Customize your characters and carry the SteelSeries flag to all your bounties and show them off to your friends. Godspeed Bounty Hunters!
data.about_the_game: Dive right into the intense action Killsquad has to offer with these new SteelSeries Skins, one for each of our heroes. Customize your characters and carry the SteelSeries flag to all your bounties and show them off to your friends. Godspeed Bounty Hunters!
data.short_description: Dive right into the intense action Killsquad has to offer with these new SteelSeries Skins, one for each of our heroes. Customize your characters and carry the SteelSeries flag to all your bounties and show them off to your friends. Godspeed Bounty Hunters!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 or AMD Phenom™ II X3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970/1060 or ATI Radeon R9 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
